Lotto Powerball $50 million jackpot: Buzz building, 2 million tickets expected to be sold for must-win draw https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-buzz-building-ceo-jason-delamore-roped-in-to-help/6OKDEB2XPBGYPJMI6HQCPJO734/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-buzz-building-ceo-jason-delamore-roped-in-to-help/6OKDEB2XPBGYPJMI6HQCPJO734/ Kirsty WynnThose who wait until last minute to buy a ticket likely to face delays. Fri, 07 Jun 2024 04:30:27 +0000 Lotto NZ has estimated more than 2 million tickets will be bought for Saturday night's $50 million jackpot.
State Highway 1 crash: Passers-by haul person from car in Lake Taupō https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-1-crash-car-goes-off-road-into-lake-taupo/HNSY2OLS65ASLJGVECUZRE522A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-1-crash-car-goes-off-road-into-lake-taupo/HNSY2OLS65ASLJGVECUZRE522A/ Maryana Garcia, Dan Hutchinson“There was a group of young guys who went in and grabbed him straight out of the car.” Fri, 07 Jun 2024 04:25:38 +0000 Passers-by have pulled a person from a car which left State Highway 1 and came to rest in Lake Taupō, near Rawhira Rd.

Far North’s proposed 16.5% rates rise cut to 5.1% after council finds $8.5m savings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-propose-165-rates-rise-cut-to-51-after-council-finds-85m- savings/IH227TUFCFBVVBAGRHM6RIWLTY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-propose-165-rates-rise-cut-to-51-after-council-finds-85m- savings/IH227TUFCFBVVBAGRHM6RIWLTY/ Mike Dinsdale“Residents told us ... the increase for our first year was far too high,” says mayor. Fri, 07 Jun 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Far North Kahika/Mayor Moko Tepania is delighted that the council was able to reduce a planned 16.5 per cent rates rise this year to 5.1 per cent after finding $8.5 million in savings and asking for a $5m dividend from its commercial arm. Photo / Michael Cunningham
